name: X-Stream Wireless Noise-Cancelling Headphones
description: Immerse yourself in a world of crisp, high-quality sound with the X-Stream Wireless Noise-Cancelling Headphones. Featuring advanced active noise cancellation technology, these headphones deliver a distraction-free listening experience. With up to 30 hours of battery life and ergonomic design, they're perfect for long commutes, workouts, or relaxation at home.
